/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling construction site in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering cranes and buildings that dominate the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the construction site. The buildings under construction are tall and imposing, their skeletal structures reaching towards the sky. Cranes, symbols of progress and development, are scattered throughout the site, their long arms reaching out over the structures. The road in front of the site is lined with cars and buses, hinting at the daily life that continues undisturbed amidst the construction. The image is a testament to the rapid urbanization and development taking place in Beijing.
